html:
12.13.23  3:55 pm   do you have any songs or ideas for songs that started with something in the drums

      maybe 1

12.13.23  3:52 pm   How do you come up with song ideas?

      everything's a song idea. so i'm just doing everything, in order

12.13.23  2:32 pm   What is your opinion on mallet percussion?

      like the taco, can be hard or soft

12.13.23  12:12 pm   what is your favorite song you have EVER made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

12.13.23  10:22 am   will working retail make me apathetic or very compassionate

      it can go either way

12.13.23  8:57 am   thoughts on non-euclidean geometry?

      haven't explored it yet. i still have more than enough euclidean geometry on my plate

12.13.23  7:43 am   How to accept the fact that nothing makes sense?

      start coming up with hypothetical examples of what 'would' make sense. just to see where you stand

12.13.23  5:01 am   What are the ingredients to a fulfilling life? 

      it can be made with any set of ingredients. actually some of the most fulfilling may be from some of the most 'unlikely' ingredients

12.13.23  3:23 am   what's the difference between answering "yes" and "sure"?

      "sure" might seem to imply there are many other additional possibilities, other than the one suggested

12.13.23  1:55 am   do you think that going insane benefits creativity?

      it does at first

12.12.23  11:57 pm   how many restaurants are actually a different restaurant?

      more and more, as you increase the time range

12.12.23  11:23 pm   should i play a funky little drum beat and plaster it all over the interconnected websites of varying popularity?

(Sent from my school approved school chromebook)

      sure

12.12.23  10:18 pm   were you there for the first christmas. ever

      no. but every christmas feels like the first one

12.12.23  9:34 pm   if you had to rhyme something with orange in a song (it is mandated by the laws of physics), what would you rhyme it with?

      Lawrence

12.12.23  8:54 pm   what is life

      movement

12.12.23  7:46 pm   what were you doing in drop-D tuning? 

      playing barred sus2 chords i assume, or maybe sus2maj7

12.12.23  7:25 pm   Why is it that every time I come here, the questions uncannily reflect on my life since coming here last time?

      it's the font color

12.12.23  6:58 pm   I just saw something so amazing that I want to experience and analyze it as much as possible, but at the same time I don't want to see it again because all the magic will have been lost and I'll ruin it for myself

      what you might want to do here is wait some time, maybe some months or years, then check it out again. if you find it magical that second time, then you'll know the magic is locked in, and then you can analyze it

12.12.23  5:41 pm   okay so why is the bass on new canaan so fucking good

      maybe as a last resort

12.12.23  5:38 pm   do you have any songs where each bar doesn't have 4 beats?

      sure. it's especially common, not just in my songs but in everyone's songs, to have non-4 bars sometimes, especially in transitions to and from the chorus, for example. or anywhere

12.12.23  4:24 pm   Is a continent an island?

      i'm not worried about it

12.12.23  4:06 pm   In a live performance of yours what would be the ratio of recorded loops to live instrumental performance?

      0:1

12.12.23  2:56 pm   counterpoint says parallel octaves and 5ths are kinda cringe, i say counterpoint is kinda cringe, but maybe its good, but i also dont want to fail my music composition classes.

      i think they need to show the specific examples of what made them think those things were cringe. i don't think anyone could pre-emptively predict that any and all uses of 5ths or 8ths in any context would be cringe. they're probably just referring to specific cases where they didn't like it. if they showed you those examples, maybe we'd figure out that our opinions aren't all so different

12.12.23  2:41 pm   What made you realize you wanted to do music?

     music

     Was it some kind of overnight epiphany or something you've wanted to do for a while?

      i've been dealing with music for as long as i can remember. and quite frequently i experience powerful moments that inspire me to get into music, then of course i realize i already am

12.12.23  2:40 pm   Why does # mean sharp and b mean flat

      i'm not sure

12.12.23  1:39 pm   how do you feel about the day and the month matching up.

     fine

     do you remember when the year matched up as well

      sure, but then i also remember before that, every january 9th, the date looked like the year. at least in america

12.12.23  12:32 pm   I typed this question with my forehead

      i believe you

12.12.23  11:45 am   do i have to make covers to be good 

      no

12.12.23  10:47 am   what are your thoughts on nirvana (the band)

      seems so simple

12.12.23  9:11 am   Is the moon made of cheese or is cheese made of the moon?

      neither. however, cheese is made, one way another, from the earth

12.12.23  7:36 am   Why do i find stupid things funny?

      what i'm wondering is why you call funny things stupid

12.12.23  6:27 am   of all the videos that you're working on, which one was "written" the earliest, and when was it written?

      most of them were written in late 2022 or early 2023, but one of them was written in august, 2020

12.12.23  3:54 am   if you had to describe yourself as a texture/surface what would it be?

i'm making designated playlists for artists i enjoy. there is a theme convention i am following, and artists are textures. for example: corduroy, tatami, etc.

      this exercise seems somehow already biased toward named textures

12.12.23  3:50 am   are you happy? what makes you happy? when i say happy i mean true unbridled joy

      happiness and joy are such peculiar phenomena that i don't believe it's entirely possible to know a specific cause. it's like waves

12.12.23  1:06 am   should i plant a tree

      sure, but then "give him a friend", which is to plant another tree next to it

12.12.23  1:02 am   How do I heat transfer?

      how about getting a triple word score in scrabble

12.12.23  12:24 am   What is one beautiful moment that you have experienced in your life? 

      someone bought me a hallmark card, with soft pastel coloring and a cursive font on it

12.11.23  11:52 pm   If you could learn one skill instantly, what would it be?

      instantaneous skill-learning

12.11.23  10:38 pm   how to do music?

      no one knows. if you can figure it out, then you will be the first

12.11.23  10:31 pm   When did all of the windmills start to turn so slow?

      they always were

12.11.23  9:19 pm   what;s good to eat at kfc

      i was going to say biscuits but now i realize i'm thinking of popeyes

12.11.23  8:52 pm   Where did you get the idea for the moon is made of cheese?

      on earth

12.11.23  8:23 pm   Are you a trillionaire?

      no, unless you include the 100 trillion pennies which i still have to bring to the coin exchange machine

12.11.23  8:19 pm   Would you for the thrill of it be a paradox

      no way

12.11.23  8:16 pm   can you make it all go faster

      no. it will automatically go extremely fast

12.11.23  8:03 pm   do you think there are more doors or wheels?

      what makes this question complicated is the fact that there are so many things that actually resemble both a door and a wheel

12.11.23  7:14 pm   How does one fall in love?

      see if you can get a disney movie made about you

12.11.23  7:11 pm   You answered what happens if the world doesn't end. But what happens when it does?

      another one begins

12.11.23  6:22 pm   if all the musical modes were people, which do you think would be the most narcissistic 

      locrian

12.11.23  5:55 pm   what was the longest timespan between writing a song and finishing it you've had?

      maybe about 10 years
